guest.name: Uri Levine
guest.title: Co-founder of Waze
guest.background: Serial entrepreneur who co-founded Waze (sold to Google for $1.1B) and Moovit (sold to Intel for $1B). He has co-founded over a dozen startups and served on multiple boards, focusing on solving large-scale problems.
guest.background_zh: 连续创业者，Waze（以11亿美元出售给Google）和Moovit（以10亿美元出售给Intel）的联合创始人。他参与创立了十余家初创公司并担任多家董事会成员，专注于解决大规模的用户痛点问题。

episodeSummary: Uri Levine shares his battle-tested philosophy on building unicorns, emphasizing the importance of falling in love with the problem rather than the solution. He breaks down the journey into distinct phases—from validating ideas through user research to achieving Product-Market Fit (PMF) and mastering the fundraising pitch.
episodeSummary_zh: Uri Levine 分享了他打造独角兽企业的实战哲学，强调创业者应“爱上问题，而非解决方案”。他将创业旅程拆解为不同阶段，深入剖析了从通过用户调研验证创意，到实现产品市场匹配（PMF），再到掌握融资路演技巧的全过程。
